## AudioEventPayloads."AUDIO.SET\_DISTORTION" property

Emitted when the audio's distortion is set.

**Signature:**

```typescript
[AudioEvent.SET_DISTORTION]: {
        audio: Audio;
        distortion: number;
    };
```
